name: Real City Drift Car
description:
REAL CITY DRIFT CAR SIMULATOR
- REAL CITY DRIFT CAR Racing gives you a unique experience in the handling of sport cars by the simple and the intuitive way
- If you like to drift, get ready to spend many hours playing this game
- Custom car and modifications
- Animation of the deep smoke while drifting

THE MOST REALISTIC MOBILE DRIFT GAME
- Insane feeling of powerful sport cars
- Unique driving on different surfaces - asphalt, grass, sand
- Racing on high detailed tracks
- You can change color of your car
- Different cameras

Be ready for amazing drift car experience. This drift game addictive.

Get ready to drive high performance cars (turbo or naturally aspirated) and make them drift at high speed in tracks designed specifically for drift racing.
Improve your racing and drifting skills and earn virtual money to tune and customize your car.

GAMEPLAY
• Accelerometer (gyroscope) or touch steering mode;
• Metric or Imperial units of measurement;
